name: Dragon Ball Absalon
overview:
The series begins twelve years after Goku is seen leaving on Shenron not at the end of Dragon Ball GT, and diverges entirely into its own plot from there, on an alternate timeline from the one which shows Goku Jr. fighting Vegeta Jr. at the World Martial Arts Tournament.

 

In this series, Majuub has reached new levels of power, and has honed the techniques taught to him by Goku. 

We also see Gotenks finally mature, and Vegeta more powerful than ever.Each character will bring forth their own set of capabilities and purpose, winning fights and being relevant, in order to create an environment that emphasizes teamwork as well as individual worth for each character.

 

In this series, the main set of villains are Saiyans, with abilities highly similar to the Saiyans that we are familiar with. These new Saiyans are more powerful than any threat the Z Fighters have ever faced, but after twelve years of intensive training, our heroes will not be easily defeated

overviews.eng:
The series begins twelve years after Goku is seen leaving on Shenron not at the end of Dragon Ball GT, and diverges entirely into its own plot from there, on an alternate timeline from the one which shows Goku Jr. fighting Vegeta Jr. at the World Martial Arts Tournament.

 

In this series, Majuub has reached new levels of power, and has honed the techniques taught to him by Goku. 

We also see Gotenks finally mature, and Vegeta more powerful than ever.Each character will bring forth their own set of capabilities and purpose, winning fights and being relevant, in order to create an environment that emphasizes teamwork as well as individual worth for each character.

 

In this series, the main set of villains are Saiyans, with abilities highly similar to the Saiyans that we are familiar with. These new Saiyans are more powerful than any threat the Z Fighters have ever faced, but after twelve years of intensive training, our heroes will not be easily defeated
overviews.ita: Dodici anni dopo la partenza di Goku alla fine di Dragon Ball GT, i Guerrieri Z hanno ripreso una normale e pacifica vita. Tuttavia una nuova minaccia incombe sulla Terra.

name: Dragon Ball Z Abridged
overview:
Dragon Ball Z Abridged is the title of TeamFourStar's abridged series based on the Dragon Ball Z anime. This abridged series is one of the most successful series created in '08-'09 and was featured on That Guy with The Glasses official website.

Dragon Ball Z Abridged is a direct parody with most characters and plot lines remaining relatively unchanged.

overviews.eng:
Dragon Ball Z Abridged is the title of TeamFourStar's abridged series based on the Dragon Ball Z anime. This abridged series is one of the most successful series created in '08-'09 and was featured on That Guy with The Glasses official website.

Dragon Ball Z Abridged is a direct parody with most characters and plot lines remaining relatively unchanged.
overviews.fra: Dragon Ball Z Abridged est une parodie directe de Dragon Ball Z dans laquelle la plupart des personnages et des intrigues restent relativement inchangés.
overviews.ita: Una parodia diretta con la maggior parte dei personaggi e delle trame che rimangono relativamente invariati.
overviews.spa: Resume y parodia al mismo tiempo Dragon Ball Z, la serie de Toei Animation emitida entre 1989 y 1996 basada en un cómic de Akira Toriyama.

name: Dragon Ball Deliverance
overview: Taking place many years after the events of Dragon Ball GT, the Z Fighters are called forth by a group of mysterious beings to help them face a powerful foe that has been causing havoc on Planet Namek.

overviews.eng: Taking place many years after the events of Dragon Ball GT, the Z Fighters are called forth by a group of mysterious beings to help them face a powerful foe that has been causing havoc on Planet Namek.
overviews.ita: Molti anni dopo gli eventi di Dragon Ball GT, i Guerrieri Z vengono chiamati da un gruppo di esseri misteriosi per aiutarli ad affrontare una potente minaccia che ha seminato il caos sul pianeta Namecc.
overviews.jpn: ドラゴンボールGTのイベントの後の数年後、Z戦士たちは謎の存在から呼び出され、パワフルな敵と対峙してナメック星を救うための手伝いをする。
overviews.spa: Dragon Ball Deliverance es una serie animada en línea creada por The Notorious Luke, co-creada por Tomotion y co-escrita por Markus Ferretti.

translations.jpn: ドラゴンボール・デリバランス

name: Dragon Ball Multiverse
overview: During the interuniversal tournament organized by Vargas, several problems caused by the other participants lead Universe 18, the Z Fighters' one, to fight with the other universes to save not only their own dimension, but even all the others.

overviews.eng: During the interuniversal tournament organized by Vargas, several problems caused by the other participants lead Universe 18, the Z Fighters' one, to fight with the other universes to save not only their own dimension, but even all the others.
overviews.ita: Durante il torneo interuniversale organizzato dai Varga, diversi problemi causati dagli altri partecipanti portano l'Universo 18, quello dei Guerrieri Z, a lottare in collaborazione con gli altri universi per salvare non solo la propria dimensione, ma anche tutte le altre.

name: Dragon Ball X
overview: Dragon Ball X is the true successor where Gohan and Shaggy find trouble lurking in the chaotic multiverse after the tyrant El Grande Padre has fallen to Gohan Blanco after he killed Goku, albeit after the Universe Survival Tournament Arc.

overviews.eng: Dragon Ball X is the true successor where Gohan and Shaggy find trouble lurking in the chaotic multiverse after the tyrant El Grande Padre has fallen to Gohan Blanco after he killed Goku, albeit after the Universe Survival Tournament Arc.

name: Dragon Ball R&R
overview: Dragon Ball R&R is a fan-made audio manga drama based on the popular What If series, "What If Raditz Turned Good" by MasakoX.

overviews.eng: Dragon Ball R&R is a fan-made audio manga drama based on the popular What If series, "What If Raditz Turned Good" by MasakoX.

name: Dragon Ball Super Friends
overview: What happens when A Perfect being, A Spoiled Emperor, A Senile Crazy old man. A Borderline Psychopath and A Homosexual Space Warrior All live under one roof? Greatness. Welcome to Dragonball Super Friends.

overviews.eng: What happens when A Perfect being, A Spoiled Emperor, A Senile Crazy old man. A Borderline Psychopath and A Homosexual Space Warrior All live under one roof? Greatness. Welcome to Dragonball Super Friends.

name: Dragon Ball Z Light of Hope
overview: Hope is worth fighting for! Dragon Ball Z: Light of Hope is a live-action adaptation of “The History of Trunks”.  It is a post apocalyptic future destroyed by two man-made Androids. Our main characters, Gohan and Trunks fight against the unstoppable Androids #17 and #18 to save as many human lives as possible. The young Trunks must grow up quickly and learn from his mentor, Gohan. But with battles to fight on both the outside and inside, how long can they endure, and where will they find a light of hope? In this timeline, Goku & the other Z Warriors are dead. This is the story of Gohan & Trunks in their battle to survive against the Androids. In addition, Bulma is fighting her own battles to create a Time Machine as well as cure for the deadly heart disease that killed Goku. Most of all, everyone learns a powerful lesson in gain and loss.

overviews.eng: Hope is worth fighting for! Dragon Ball Z: Light of Hope is a live-action adaptation of “The History of Trunks”.  It is a post apocalyptic future destroyed by two man-made Androids. Our main characters, Gohan and Trunks fight against the unstoppable Androids #17 and #18 to save as many human lives as possible. The young Trunks must grow up quickly and learn from his mentor, Gohan. But with battles to fight on both the outside and inside, how long can they endure, and where will they find a light of hope? In this timeline, Goku & the other Z Warriors are dead. This is the story of Gohan & Trunks in their battle to survive against the Androids. In addition, Bulma is fighting her own battles to create a Time Machine as well as cure for the deadly heart disease that killed Goku. Most of all, everyone learns a powerful lesson in gain and loss.
overviews.fra: L'espoir vaut la peine de se battre ! Dragon Ball Z : Light of Hope est une adaptation en direct de "The History of Trunks". C'est un futur post-apocalyptique détruit par deux androïdes artificiels. Nos personnages principaux, Gohan et Trunks se battent contre les imparables androïdes #17 et #18 pour sauver autant de vies humaines que possible. Le jeune Trunks doit grandir rapidement et apprendre de son mentor, Gohan. Mais avec des batailles à mener à la fois à l'extérieur et à l'intérieur, combien de temps peuvent-ils durer, et où trouveront-ils une lumière d'espoir ? Dans cette chronologie, Goku et les autres guerriers Z sont morts. C'est l'histoire de Gohan et Trunks dans leur combat pour survivre contre les androïdes. De plus, Bulma mène ses propres batailles pour créer une machine à remonter le temps et guérir la maladie cardiaque mortelle qui a tué Goku. Surtout, tout le monde apprend une puissante leçon de gain et de perte.

translations.eng: Dragon Ball Z Light of Hope

name: Dragon Ball Taiyou
overview: Fan Animation Series based on Dragon Ball Xenoverse

overviews.eng: Fan Animation Series based on Dragon Ball Xenoverse
